description: I. Final report by DFID/BBC on research into perceptions of television news coverage of developing countries. 2002. 20 p. II. Reports by MORI on the attitudes of schoolchildren to international development for each year from 2000 to 2004. III. Public attitudes towards development, based on data from the National Statistics Omnibus Surveys for each year from 1999 to 2003. IV. Increasing levels of understanding and support for development within the UK. Executive summary, 2003. 3 p. V. Summary of key findings from qualitative and quantitative research among the public and opinion leaders. 1998. 10 p.
department: Dept for International Development BBC MORI Office for National Statistics
